titleStmt.title: Dauids thanksgiuing for the arraignement of the man of earth, set forth in two sermons by W.B. The first sermon sheweth the manner of Dauids thanksgining, and containeth many comfortable points necessarie for afflicted consciences. The second sermon setteth forth the matter it selfe, for Dauid giueth thanks and that is, The arraignement of the man of earth ...
titleStmt.author: Burton, William, d. 1616.

titleStmt.title: Dauids thanksgiuing for the arraignement of the man of earth, set forth in two sermons by W.B. The first sermon sheweth the manner of Dauids thanksgining, and containeth many comfortable points necessarie for afflicted consciences. The second sermon setteth forth the matter it selfe, for Dauid giueth thanks and that is, The arraignement of the man of earth ...
titleStmt.author: Burton, William, d. 1616.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Richard Bradocke, for I.B. [i.e. J. Broome] and are to be sold at her shop at the great North doore of S. Paules, at the signe of the Bible.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
